product_name: Climbing Mt. Whiteny: The Complete Hiking and Climbing Guide - 3rd Edition
long_description: This new edition has been updated for every level of climber. Authors: Peter Croft and Wynne Benti. Softcover; 128 pages; black-and-white photos; maps. Spotted Dog Press; copyright 2005. Updates include: how to get the most out of your conditioning; prepping for overnight trips; dayhiking the main Whitney Trail. Describes the North Fork approach; Whitney from other passes; cross-country routes; and challenging technical routes for advanced climbers.
short_description: This new edition has been updated for every level of climber.
